BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 980640 PCK, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning the site selection and acquisition of real property located at 1177 Flushing Avenue , Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 34, for use as a garage.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Uniform land use review procedure application no. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
